metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8804 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
x86_64/ecc-384-modp.asm in Nettle before 3.2 does not properly handle carrypropagation and produces incorrect output in its implementation of theP-384 NIST elliptic curve, which allows attackers to have unspecifiedimpact via unknown vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8804` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhogweed2 - 2.7.1-1ubuntu0.1
libnettle4 - 2.7.1-1ubuntu0.1
nettle-bin - 2.7.1-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nettle package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.1-1ubuntu0.1').
